column5: Looking to try for some pike in Zone 17 once pike opens up May9th(Second Sat.), all i can really see on the regulations map for this zone is lake O, rice lake and scugog. Now i know scugog has no pike and Rice lake is a little to far for a hour or two of fishing so does lake O have any good pike fishing off shore? Located in Oshawa and looking to travel up to 30mins away. Any areas that can be recommended for me?   Thanks, Mike
go south on xxxxx till it ends, cast a spoon there.  I'll see ya there...

the areas that come to mind are frenchmans bay, and whitby harbour. ive also seen someone catch a small hammerhandle at mclaughlin bay. theres probably pike in bowmanville harbour too. basically any lake O harbour near the dirty shwa that holds some green weeds should also be holding some pike. good luck!
